mechanics.trigger: Target makes Dexterity saving throw against Sacred Flame
mechanics.outcome: Target does NOT receive AC or Dexterity saving throw bonus from cover
Spell's radiant damage increases by 1d8 (2d8 at 5th, 3d8 at 11th, 4d8 at 17th)

description_text: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw. The spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).
